name: IT Support Assistant

intents.description: Request access to an application or resource

make me laugh tell me a joke

intents.description: Understand if a user is asking to tell a joke

you have frikin no idea what I'm saying

reset my pwd and text it my phone

intents.description: Intent for handling password requests from users

examples.text: what happened to my service request?
are you working on my ticket?
what is the ETA on the completion of my service request?
can you provide an update on my ask for help with install?
When will a technician some to fix my problem?
when will my issue get resolved?
what was the last known update to my ticket?
can you tell me whats happening with my ticket?

intents.description: Query and find out the status of a previously submitted service request

examples.text: That's great. Talk to you later
Thank you very much. Talk to you later

intents.description: Understand a user goodbye or sign-off message

examples.text: what do you think about Microsoft AI?
what's bigger, the moon or the sun?
tell me the time what does your watch say?
can you tell me the exact time now?
WHat do you like to do

intents.description: Detect chit-chat and small talk utterances

examples.text: what is the winning lottery number?
how many days of vacation do I have?
Please cancel the order that was recently placed
Displaced fracture of lesser tuberosity of unspecified humerus

intents.description: Irrelevant examples for the model to learn.

description: Level-1 assistant that interacts with users and solves IT support problems like password reset, install issues etc.

values: Your password has been reset. An email will be sent to $_email
I see that you are in @user_department department.
I loved reading the Robots of Dawn by Isaac Asimov
Let me calculate that for you, oh dang you broke my calculator
I love a bright & sunny day. Can you look outside your window and let me know as well?
My favorite number is 42, duh!

No problem! I love helping people.

generic.title: I'm always here to help. What kind of issue are you having?
generic.description: Type one if you don't see an option.

values: I have your email as $_email

Since you are NOT in the office, I have opened a service request with ID . A technician will reach out to you via $email and/or on $phone within the next 30 mins to schedule a remote troubleshooting session.

Since you are in the office, I can have the local IT Support address this issue. I have opened a service request with ID $serviceRequestId. A technician from your $office location will reach out to you within the next 30 mins to perform in-person troubleshooting.

Thanks for notifying the printer issue. I see you are in $officeLocation. Will send a technician right away. If it is a paper jam, try following the instructions you will find on the printer or copier.
So it is a printer issue ... let me try to gather more information.

values.text: We have noticed issues with Microsoft Skype. We recommend that you uninstall and reinstall the application with VPN turned OFF.

generic.title: Also verify your VPN config as shown below
Please confirm that you are currently at the office location $office

values.text: You have $openRequests service request(s) open. Here is the status of the most recent service request.

ID 845875412
Status In-progress
Assignee Michael Choi
Type Software Installation
Priority Normal
Location 123 Spooner Street
Estimated Completion 10/3/2018
Notes User has cited issues with installing Slack.

Add this segment via the JSON Editor to make programmatic calls to your backend API’s that can provide ticket status via IBM Function.
"actions": [ { "name": "/swamichandra@gmail.com_dev/QueryTicketStatus", "type": "cloud_function", "parameters": { "userId": "$userId" }, "credentials": "$ibm_function_credentials", "result_variable": "context.password_reset_response" } ]

values: Sorry that I'm not able to help you properly.  If needed, I can connect you to an agent immediately.
Please allow me to locate an  agent who can better assist you with this matter...

values.text: Sorry,  I did not understand that.
I can answer questions and solve IT Help Desk related issues. I'm also learning.

values: Hello. I'am $avatarName, your intelligent assistant.  I can answer questions and solve IT Help Desk related issues. Ask me about topics like Password Reset etc.
